name: 1985: The Golden Age
description:
1985: The Golden Age is a FNAF Fangame about what happened to Fredbear's Family Diner in 1985.

Gameplay

The gameplay is very simple, survive the first few nights against Fredbear and GoldenAge Bonnie. The last few nights play out differently and I am currently not sure how they are going to play out! I will keep everyone posted!

Software

  • Blender 2.79
  • Cinema 4D
  • Clickteam Fusion 2.5 Developer

Developers

  • creepcomix (CreepX451) - Lead Developer/Modeler/Coder
